name: Time Wizard (Chimney Sweep)
description:
Play as a wizard and try to stop the evil grand master before time resets. Speed your way through islands and battles with other wizards to reach the end before everything resets.

CONTROLS - 

Enter/f4 for fullscreen.

WASD to Move

Mouse to aim,

Left click on mouse to grab wands and shoot magic.

Right click to drop your current wand.
